00040 BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz::BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz(const Args &args) {
00041   size_t amount = ((SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS) < (SCRATCH_COMPRESS))
00042       ? (SCRATCH_COMPRESS) : (SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS);
00043   m_workmem = new uint8_t [amount];
00044 }

00050 BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz::~BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz() {
00051   delete [] m_workmem;
00052 }

00055 
00059 void
00060 BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz::deflate(const DynamicBuffer &input,
00061     DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header, size_t reserve) {
00062   uint32_t avail_out = input.fill() + 400;
00063   size_t len;
00064 
00065   output.clear();
00066   output.reserve(header.length() + avail_out + reserve);
00067 
00068   // compress
00069   len = qlz_compress((char *)input.base, (char *)output.base+header.length(),
00070                      input.fill(), (char *)m_workmem);
00071 
00072   /* check for an incompressible block */
00073   if (len >= input.fill()) {
00074     header.set_compression_type(NONE);
00075     memcpy(output.base+header.length(), input.base, input.fill());
00076     header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00077     header.set_data_zlength(input.fill());
00078   }
00079   else {
00080     header.set_compression_type(QUICKLZ);
00081     header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00082     header.set_data_zlength(len);
00083   }
00084   header.set_data_checksum(fletcher32(output.base + header.length(),
00085                            header.get_data_zlength()));
00086 
00087   output.ptr = output.base;
00088   header.encode(&output.ptr);
00089   output.ptr += header.get_data_zlength();
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00096 void BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz::inflate(const DynamicBuffer &input,
00097     DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header) {
00098   const uint8_t *msg_ptr = input.base;
00099   size_t remaining = input.fill();
00100 
00101   header.decode(&msg_ptr, &remaining);
00102 
00103   if (header.get_data_zlength() != remaining)
00104     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER, "Block decompression error, "
00105               "header zlength = %lu, actual = %lu",
00106               (Lu)header.get_data_zlength(), (Lu)remaining);
00107 
00108   uint32_t checksum = fletcher32(msg_ptr, remaining);
00109 
00110   if (checksum != header.get_data_checksum())
00111     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_CHECKSUM_MISMATCH, "Compressed block "
00112               "checksum mismatch header=%lx, computed=%lx",
00113               (Lu)header.get_data_checksum(), (Lu)checksum);
00114 
00115   output.reserve(header.get_data_length());
00116 
00117    // check compress type
00118   if (header.get_compression_type() == NONE)
00119     memcpy(output.base, msg_ptr, header.get_data_length());
00120   else {
00121     size_t len;
00122     // decompress
00123     len = qlz_decompress((char *)msg_ptr, (char *)output.base,
00124                          (char *)m_workmem);
00125     HT_ASSERT(len == header.get_data_length());
00126   }
00127   output.ptr = output.base + header.get_data_length();
00128 }
